name: Saiyam Pathak
tagline: CNCF Ambassador, Principal Developer Advocate at Loft Labs, founder of Kubesimplify
bio: Saiyam Pathak is a CNCF Ambassador and Principal Developer Advocate at Loft Labs, focusing on vCluster and Kubernetes multi-tenancy. He's the founder of Kubesimplify and CNCF TAG Sustainability Lead, passionate about simplifying cloud-native technologies and building developer communities.
